items.title: Fiery scenes in stands halt Bundesliga match
items.summary: Watch the moment a referee is forced to stop play in the match between Union Berlin and Eintracht Frankfurt in the Bundesliga, after the home fans set off flares in the stands in celebration of their 60th birthday.

items.title: Ronaldo misses second game in a row for Al-Nassr
items.summary: Cristiano Ronaldo is left out of the Al-Nassr squad for a second game in a row amid doubts over his future at the Saudi Arabian club.

items.title: Bompastor extends Chelsea contract until 2030

items.title: Eddie takes up ski jumping to try and become an Olympian
items.summary: Feel-good drama starring Taron Egerton and Hugh Jackman

items.title: Tactics, transfers and turmoil - inside the fall of Amorim
